content.rendered:
Welcome to our section for all matters Special Educational Needs, Disabilities (SEND) and Equal Opportunities.

Our leader of SEND and Inclusion is Mrs R Fearn. You can email for support or advice on r.fearn@springvaleprimary.org.

Please see our key documents below:

Code of Practice – Final

Criteria for SEND Nov 2019

Inclusion Policy 2018

Cycle for Inclusion Nov 2019

Disability Equality letter 2020 onwards

20200415 EIS offer

Graduated Response Doc 2019

letter for sci for website

Mental_health_and_behaviour_in_schools

Outline of SEND procedures Nov 2019

Parent_Info_Short_Breaks_Service_Leaflet_2012-13. School Offer SEND 2018

SCI Early Years Primary Transition_Re-integration Booklet PDF

Education Endowment Foundation Research Reports

EEF_Effective_parental_engagement_for_pupils_with_SEND

EEF_Four_Common_SEND_Misconceptions

EEF_High_Quality_Teaching_for_Pupils_with_SEND

EEF_Special_Educational_Needs_in_Mainstream_Schools_Guidance_Report

jetpack-related-posts.title: Policies
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Welcome to our policies page!  All of our policies will be reviewed over a three-year period and, once ratified by Governors, they will appear here.  If you would like a copy of a policy not listed here please contact the School Office.  The policies in bold have been agreed through…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Letters Home
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Welcome to our 'Letters Home' section where you will find a copy of all formal school communication in reverse chronological order, if you can't find what you are looking for please contact our School Office for a copy. Springvale Week 7 Newsletter 2020-21 Springvale Week 6 Newsletter 2020-21 OPEN EVENING…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Contact Us
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: School Contact Details: Springvale Primary School Sheffield Road Penistone S36 6HJ   Need to get in touch? The fastest way to reach us is by telephone on 01226 760930 If you need to report child absence, please call 01226 760939 All enquiries will be handled by Mrs C Ridgwick and Miss…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Physical Education (PE), Sport and Dance
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Our PE, dance and sport team is led by Mrs N Exley. Please feel free to ask her for any advice or support required. Our PE link Governor is Mr Andrew Noble.   Some free PE resources during school closure (more on the main 'curriculum' start tab...) real PE at…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Curriculum
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: HOME SCHOOL SUPPORT During the current Covid-19 outbreak situation we will be adding links to useful learning opportunities and resources here. These will be in sections relating to classes, subject leaders or additional need pupils and each section will be in order of publication with the most recent content at…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Phonics and Reading
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Our Reading leaders are Mrs R Fearn and Mrs D Royston. Please ask them for more information or support where needed. At Springvale we foster a love of reading from an early age. To read our ‘intent statement’ for early Literacy and phonics, please see here: Early Literacy and Phonics…
